abstract: There’s nothing sadder than mourning comic book mutants.
snippet: There’s nothing sadder than mourning comic book mutants.
lead_paragraph: WEDNESDAY’S PUZZLE — “Add a letter” themes are nothing new, but Alex Boisvert ups the ante by selecting X as his addition of choice. That can’t be easy. Then he somehow manages to pull off this thematic stunt five times. It’s an impressive grid. All the theme answers are very good. “Curious person’s video game console” for PANDORA’S XBOX is outstanding.
